=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bloom Krans Vulva Harmony Moisturizer: Organic Vulva Cream for Intimate Feminine Care & Health including Dryness & Itch Relief (Estrogen Free, Dye Free, Fragrance Free, Steroid Free) - 2.25 Oz (Aloe Free - 1 Pack) Review Date: 2018/08/06 Store: Bloom Krans Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bloom Krans', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '2.2 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body'} Review Text: This Vaginal Moisturizer - Vulva Balm - USDA Organic Aloe Free & Natural Vaginal Cream - Intimate Skin Cream - Reduce Vaginal Dryness, Itching & Burning - Estrogen Free Treatment - V. Harmony (1) will relieve a multitude of irritations caused by many different issues. One of the main irritations are pads or tampons. Every month, especially for a heavy period, menstrual pads can cause painful irritations, dryness, rashes, pain and itching. Then when you are into menopause, the irritations, dryness, rashes, pain and itching are a hundred times worse, due to heavy periods that can last forever.

There are many other issues that can cause constant irritations besides pads and tampons- if you’ve ever had a bad Urinary Tract Infection, where you are urinating frequently in pain, the rashes are unbearable. Having a weak bladder at times where you need a heavier pad or diaper causes more unpleasant rashes. It is so difficult to find a cream that will actually help with severe chafing, dryness, pain, itching and irritations. This V. Harmony Vaginal Moisturizer helps immensely with chafing and dryness. But when it comes to helping with severe rashes, itching and pain- make sure you refrigerate this first before applying, because you will be happy you did. Applying this cold is the best relief ever- the pain goes away immediately. Take the time to refrigerate the jar for maximum, instant relief! 5 STARS. Review Title: Refrigerate For Maximum, Instant Relief Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LaClaire Eye Firming Serum with Caffeine, Peptides, Botanicals - Best Treatment for Puffy Eyes, Wrinkles, Fine Lines (5 ml/0.5 oz) Review Date: 2018/09/04 Store: LaClaire Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.43 x 5.35 x 5.28 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07DXG9LDT_US', 'UPC': '891040000569', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'} Review Text: LaClaire Eye Firming Serum with Caffeine, Peptides, Botanicals - Best Treatment for Puffy Eyes, Wrinkles, Fine Lines (5 ml/0.5 oz) gave me immediate results in reducing puffiness from not sleeping well. I don’t always get a good night’s sleep and in the morning, the puffiness shows and sometimes dark circles accompany the puffiness.

This Eye Firming Serum works unbelievably fast. The puffiness goes away within an hour. As for dark circles, they do fade out with daily use- you will notice a difference within a week. The main thing I noticed is a tighter, firmer feel of my under eye area. This tightening and firming of the delicate eye area actually does make fine lines disappear. Age spots don’t disappear, but your skin will brighten up.

This Eye Firming Serum is so easy to use. You simply apply a drop or two with the dropper and lightly dab into your skin with a finger. If you do this at night, you will wake up to a firmer skin and it looks brighter, but it’s the feeling of firmness and tightness you will love. Applying a good moisturizer after the Eye Serum really makes your under eye skin look fabulous and feeling hydrated. Keeping the dropper clean after use will result in always having the serum perfect and moist with no dried out particles. Any Eye Serum that can immediately get rid of puffiness from a bad night’s sleep and leave your skin around your eyes feeling firmer and tighter gets 5 STARS from me. Review Title: Instantly Removes Puffiness, But It’s The Firmness & Tightness You Will Love Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: English Laundry Men's 4 Piece Coffret Review Date: 2018/12/22 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'English Laundry', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '0.67 Fluid Ounces', 'Scent': 'Coriander,Lemon,Sandalwood,Vanilla', 'Special Feature': 'The small sizes make these bottles perfect for traveling.', 'Product Dimensions': '11.2 x 2.3 x 4.5 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CF004', 'UPC': '819029013041', 'Manufacturer': '3B International', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.', 'International Shipping': 'This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More'} Review Text: English Laundry Men's 4 Piece 20ml Coffret is a truly wonderful men’s cologne set. You are getting four fragrances- rated 4 and 5 STARS all in one box. The fragrances rated by me are based on my years spent working in a cosmetic factory. I will list each fragrance separately.

ARROGANT- With top notes of bergamot and cedar you get a woodsy freshness to the scent. The middle notes of coriander and lavender bring a warm, clean freshness. At the base are sandalwood, amber and musk bringing a warm, sensual, spicy scent. All together, you get a spicy, warm, woodsy scent with a distinctive freshness to it. This light, sensual scent lasts all day and smells wonderful on almost every man, so 5 STARS.

OXFORD BLEU- The top notes of mint and lemon add a citrus freshness. The middle notes of iris and geranium bring a very light floral scent. The base adds sandalwood and vanilla for a woodsy delicious scent. All together, this scent is light, with an undertone bit of floral and clean citrus and a nice light woodsy smell. This light, woodsy fragrance smells fabulous on almost every man and does last long for 5 STARS.

RIVIERA- With top notes of lemon, bergamot, lime and cedar, you get a refreshing citrus/woods scent. In the middle are jasmine, patchouli, vetiver, lavender and mandarin- most of these were used in the 60's sexy, warm, earthy scents. At the base notes are nutmeg and coumarin to add some spice. This is not for every man, but for a man who likes a more vibrant scent. These scents are very noticeable and not light, being a very woodsy, earthy, warm fragrance with a touch of zest. 4 STARS.

NOTTING HILL- The top notes begin with bergamot, lemon and lime for a clean, natural scent. Then the middle notes have bolder peppercorn and jasmine bringing a rose/herbal scent. At the bottom are cedarwood, sandalwood, amber and a powdery musk for a very potent woodsy, animal musky scent. This is definitely not for every man being very heavy scents. There is nothing light about this fragrance. 4 STARS.

With four interesting fragrances, two being light and two being heavy, every man is sure to find one he will like. Lighter scents always smell wonderful on almost every man and the bolder scents smell great on a man depending on how his chemistry goes with the bolder fragrances. 4 ½ STARS. Review Title: Two 5 STAR and Two 4 STAR Fragrances- some are sure to please every man Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 10 Pcs Brown and 10 Pcs Black Wig Grip Headband for women Review Date: 2019/01/04 Store: Aksice Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Item Weight': '0.04 Pounds', 'Brand': 'Aksice', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.29 x 3.5 x 0.39 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '755101763483', 'Manufacturer': 'Sekass'} Review Text: Sekass Flexible Velvet Headband Non-slip Wig Grip Scarf Beige Adjustable Wig Hair Band for Women is so wonderfully secure all day. If your head circumference is between 20 to 25 inches, you will get a soft and snug fit. This headband is great as it is totally adjustable. The included invisible nylon hair net with elastic keeps every hair in place. The mesh in this cap is woven with nylon/spandex and keeps your head cool as it’s mesh design is wide enough to breathe.

The velvety soft headband is on the thick side, but it holds so well. It has stretchability and velcro to adjust it tightly to your head. Both the net cap and headband are so easy to apply. I love the fact that the net cap holds your hair in place, no matter how thick your hair, it holds it all in nice and flat, while allowing your head to breathe. Then the stretchy headband holds tight to keep your wig from moving or slipping. No more hair pins, tape or glue, just pure comfort with a secure, soft and snug fit. 5 STARS. Review Title: Pure Comfort & Confidence With A Secure, Soft & Snug Fit Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) Review Date: 2019/07/24 Store: No Name Necessary Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Review Text: N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) puts a layer of silky smoothness between your skin and your make-up. I have combination skin- some parts dry, regular and oily. I also have aging skin, so I really didn’t think this primer spray would help me, but it surprisingly did. This comes in a spray bottle and you have to shake the bottle well before spraying, keeping your eyes tightly shut.

It sprays with a fine mist, but has a foaming in it. After spraying, I gently rubbed it more evenly on my face. It dries instantly and wow, my face felt like velvet. If anyone knows about aging skin- your make-up shows the fine lines and wrinkles more exaggerated. This primer spray somehow smooths your skin more, leaving it like a smooth slate for make-up. I am very impressed with this spray, as nothing helps aging skin like this does for make-up, powder, even touch up concealers. A wonderful product. 5 STARS. Review Title: Puts A Layer Of Silky Smoothness Between You & Your Make-Up Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Altaba Ombre Brown Short Bob Wig with Bangs Natural Looking Bob Wigs for Women 12" Straight Silky Hair Synthetic Heat Resistant Wigs for Daily Party Cosplay Hair Wig Review Date: 2020/11/27 Store: Altaba Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 8.07 x 2.28 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} Review Text: Altaba Brown Short Bob Wig With Bangs Natural Looking Bob Wigs For Women 12" Straight Silky Hair Synthetic Heat Resistant Wigs For Daily Party Cosplay Hair Wig is a cute bob wig. This wig is soft, is a beautiful color and easy to cut or style. It is one of those wigs that doesn’t look fake, if you style it a bit to your face shape, or even trim it a bit. The color is nice, a bit darker than the photos show. The wig is made with good synthetic fibers, which you can easily wash and style with heat tools on a low setting. For fun or play, a cute wig for the price. 4 STARS. Review Title: For Fun Or Play, A Cute Wig For The Price Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower) Review Date: 2020/12/15 Store: Bloomlover Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Brand': 'Bloomlover', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.66 x 7.28 x 1.77 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '787687864926'} Review Text: Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower) is so delicate and beautiful. The tiny sunflowers are made of fabric and even though the greenery is made of plastic, it is delicate enough to still look lovely. There are two loops on the brown covered wire ends, which tie with a white ribbon. You can shape this wire circle to any shape to custom fit your head and loosen the ribbon on the looped ends to make it larger. You can also use any color or size of ribbon to customize the look you want. A very delicate lovely tiny sunflower head wreath made so you can customize it for your personal needs. 4 ½ STARS. Review Title: Delicate & Beautiful Tiny Sunflowers Head Wreath Which You Can Customize To Fit Your Personal Needs Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: GETNOIVAS Silver Baroque Vintage Rhinestone Crystal Crown, Queen Crown for Women, Costume Party Accessories for Wedding Birthday Costume Baby Showers Pageant Headpiece Headdress for Cosplay Party Review Date: 2020/12/25 Store: GETNOIVAS Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 7.28 x 3.86 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Review Text: GETNOIVAS Silver Baroque Vintage Rhinestone Crystal Crown, Queen Crown for Women, Costume Party Accessories for Wedding Birthday Costume Baby Showers Pageant Headpiece Headdress for Cosplay Party is so realistic looking, you’ll think you are a queen wearing this. This crown came in a heavy duty blue box, also wrapped in plastic inside the box. It arrived in perfect condition.

This crown is heavy, made of a strong silver metal and with over 300 tiny, medium and large rhinestones. These rhinestones sparkle like brilliant diamonds. This is without a doubt the most realistic looking crown I’ve ever seen. At the ends of the crown are two loops, so you can add a ribbon or silver tie to keep this securely on your head. The tie is needed, as this crown is heavy. If you want to look like a real princess or queen on your special occasion, this crown will definitely do that. Brilliantly Realistic Crown is beyond gorgeous! 5 STARS. Review Title: Brilliantly Realistic, Sparkling, Heavy Crown With Over 300 Rhinestones Is Beyond Gorgeous! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HAIRCUBE Natural Looking Short Blonde Wigs Pixie Cut Dark Root Ombre Blonde Wigs with Bangs Wigs for Women Review Date: 2020/12/30 Store: HAIRCUBE Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Memory Fiber', 'Hair Type': 'Pixie Cut', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'HAIRCUBE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 7.8 x 3.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'aswig61-wm3045'} Review Text: HAIRCUBE Natural Looking Short Blonde Wigs Pixie Cut Dark Root Ombre Blonde Wigs with Bangs Wigs for Women is a beautiful, natural looking wig. The pixie cut is so perfect, I put this on right out of the bag, used my fingers to part it, and couldn’t believe how natural it looks. The wig has elastic around the sides that stretches to fit your head. Around the ears are comfortable flaps. Inside the wig are four tiny combs to keep it in place. As for the bangs, if they are too long, no cutting is needed- just pull the wig back farther.

The color is gorgeously mixed with the darker roots and several blonde colors mixed together for a truly natural look. There is no shiny fake look to the sheen and it’s not too thick, making it so natural. The heaviest part of the hair is where it should be on top of the head and with the bangs layered beautifully. The back is layered perfect as well and is so breathable! You can part it any where and it always looks perfect. The wig also comes with directions and a net to cover your hair. A perfect, natural looking wig right out of the bag! Review Title: Perfect, Beautiful, Natural Looking Wig Right Out Of The Bag Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Crystal Rhinestone Gold Tone headband White/Mix color Gemstone Thin Hair Hoop goddess Daily hair accessory for Women Girls Review Date: 2021/03/25 Store: CAFUDEYE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Color': 'Clear,Golden,White,Gold', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'CAFUDEYE', 'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 6.22 x 0.94 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: Crystal Rhinestone Gold Tone headband White/Mix color Gemstone Thin Hair Hoop goddess Daily hair accessory for Women Girls is the most comfortable gem studded headband I have ever worn. This is especially nice for younger people who hate the pain of a tight headband, but want to wear one for that special occasion. And this headband is so beautiful, you will want one for that special occasion.

The headband itself feels like a very thin, light metal underneath soft gold fabric. The ends are wrapped yet again with a soft, silky black fabric to sit like a feather behind your ears. The stones are firmly set on a thin metal band which are attached to the gold fabric. What surprises me is this headband doesn’t slip at all on my medium size head. I can also wear it like a crown which looks stunningly beautiful with all the “diamonds” sparkling. It’s the loveliest headband that is beyond soft and comfortable and will make everyone feel like royalty when wearing it for a most special occasion. 5 STARS. Review Title: Most Comfortable, Beautiful Headband That Doubles As A Crown Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: X-TRESS Classic Realistic Bob Wig Ombre Brown Short Hair Side Part Heat Resistant Fiber for Black Women Synthetic Wigs Review Date: 2021/03/25 Store: X-TRESS Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'X-TRESS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult'} Review Text: X-TRESS Classic Realistic Bob Wig Ombre Brown Short Hair Side Part Heat Resistant Fiber for Black Women Synthetic Wigs is a very pretty side part wig. The actual color and style are beautiful and very natural looking. You will not find a more beautiful wig at this price. The wig cap has elastic adjustable hooks, so it will fit your head perfectly. The color and styling are the most beautiful features of this wig. The only thing that gives this wig away that it is indeed a wig, is the part. It’s a little too thick at the part. The black roots blend down into the most beautiful golden brown hair. The wig is styled into lovely blown back waves, which is especially flattering around the face. A beautiful wig in color and style. 4 ½ STARS. Review Title: Beautiful Wig In Both Color & Style Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kids Size Long Wavy Cosplay Wig for Princess Halloween Party Review Date: 2021/05/29 Store: ColorGround Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'ColorGround', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 7.6 x 1.61 inches; 10.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CM06011043'} Review Text: Kids Size Long Wavy Halloween Wig (for 4-12 years old) is a stunning, beautiful wig for costume or play. This wig immediately reminded me of Sleeping Beauty’s gorgeous long curls and color. These curls are absolutely divine in both the ends and bangs. Truly a magnificent princess wig. There are elastic bands at the back of the wig to make it fit any size head. It will fit a small to large head with these clip elastic adjustments. Should the wig be too large for a really young, small child, you can always stitch it closer in the back on the inside. A couple stitches has made any wig tighter, and you can always remove the stitches for a larger child. However, I found the elastic straps hook really tight or looser, so I didn’t have a need for that. The curls are layered for a stunning effect. I love the bangs having those same large curls for a true princess look. The color is a light and gold blonde mix- just gorgeous. This is one beautiful wig for play or costume. 5 STARS. Review Title: Stunning, Beautiful, Adjustable Wig For Costume Or Play Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: QTMY Wide Headbands Fashion Women Baroque Crystal Gemstone Hair Accessories Head Band Fashion Headwear Hairbands for Women Review Date: 2021/06/13 Store: QTMY Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'QTMY', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ZJ'} Review Text: QTMY Wide Headbands Fashion Women Baroque Crystal Gemstone Hair Accessories Head Band Fashion Headwear Hairbands for Women is a very pretty, highly dressy headband with lots of bling. The thick headband itself is almost two inches wide, yet very flexible and soft. It stays on your head in total comfort, even with it’s weight. The hundreds of diamond look crystal stones are glued on and you have to be careful putting it on and removing it, so that it doesn’t catch your hair. I received a pretty flower and pearl hair barrette free with this purchase- also glued on pieces and one already fell off- but an easy fix with a craft glue. If you need to add bling to your hair, this headband will do it. 5 STARS. Review Title: If You Need To Add Bling To Your Hair, This Headband Will Do It Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FanArti False Eyelashes and Glue Pen Kit,5 Pairs Fake Eyelash & 2 in1 Design Lash Eyeliner (Black+Clear), Easy to Apply and Comfortable,Tweezer Included,All Day Wear Review Date: 2021/07/06 Store: FanArti Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FanArti', 'Material': 'Synthetic Fiber', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 5.67 x 0.55 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 5.67 x 0.55 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: FanArti False Eyelashes and Glue Pen Kit,5 Pairs Fake Eyelash & 2 in1 Design Lash Eyeliner (Black+Clear), Easy to Apply and Comfortable,Tweezer Included,All Day Wear come with a glue pen and an eyeliner pen. You have to test the products on your skin first to make certain you have no allergic reactions before using them. I thought the glue pen is just an adhesive and the eyeliner pen, as with all false eyelash eyeliner pens was magnetic, but I was wrong. The glue and eyeliner seem to be both magnetic. You have to wait until both are completely dry before applying the lashes, as the magnetic properties are what keep your lashes on. The 5 pairs of lashes are all very lovely and there is something for every occasion from work to play to dress up. I wish it had been made more clear that these are magnetic lashes, as I only use glue adhesive lashes, and only hypo allergenic glues to protect my eyes. To remove these lashes with the magnetic liner or adhesive on your eyes, you need a good liquid make up remover and cotton pads. For not making the magnetic properties totally clear even though the lashes are lovely, 3 STARS. Review Title: Pretty, But Totally Magnetic Lashes With No Regular Adhesive Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: If You Need To Add Bling To Your Hair, This Headband Will Do It Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FanArti False Eyelashes and Glue Pen Kit,5 Pairs Fake Eyelash & 2 in1 Design Lash Eyeliner (Black+Clear), Easy to Apply and Comfortable,Tweezer Included,All Day Wear Review Date: 2021/07/06 Store: FanArti Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FanArti', 'Material': 'Synthetic Fiber', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 5.67 x 0.55 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 5.67 x 0.55 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} Review Text: FanArti False Eyelashes and Glue Pen Kit,5 Pairs Fake Eyelash & 2 in1 Design Lash Eyeliner (Black+Clear), Easy to Apply and Comfortable,Tweezer Included,All Day Wear come with a glue pen and an eyeliner pen. You have to test the products on your skin first to make certain you have no allergic reactions before using them. I thought the glue pen is just an adhesive and the eyeliner pen, as with all false eyelash eyeliner pens was magnetic, but I was wrong. The glue and eyeliner seem to be both magnetic. You have to wait until both are completely dry before applying the lashes, as the magnetic properties are what keep your lashes on. The 5 pairs of lashes are all very lovely and there is something for every occasion from work to play to dress up. I wish it had been made more clear that these are magnetic lashes, as I only use glue adhesive lashes, and only hypo allergenic glues to protect my eyes. To remove these lashes with the magnetic liner or adhesive on your eyes, you need a good liquid make up remover and cotton pads. For not making the magnetic properties totally clear even though the lashes are lovely, 3 STARS.
